author: Reuters Editorial
title: Senegal confirms third and fourth coronavirus cases
description: Senegalese authorities reported two new cases of coronavirus on Wednesday, bringing the total to four since the first case was confirmed there on Monday.
content:

author: Al Jazeera
title: Senegal: Social distancing, hand-washing difficult amid poverty
description: Senegal locks down, but with limited access to clean water, fears rise about how far infections could spread.
content:
In Senegal, the government has ordered curfews and lockdowns to stem the spread of the coronavirus.
But in a country with limited access to clean water, following the health guidelines is difficult.
Al Jazeeras Nicolas Haque reports from Dakar:
